description: Modules: Introduction to Marine Sciences, Microbes and Biogeochemistry, Introduction to Physical Oceanography, Coastal Ecology, Evolutionary Paleobiology and Proxies, Oceans Law and Policy, Communicating Science with the Public.
Modules: Biology of Marine Invertebrates, Marine Ecology, Conservation of Biodiversity.

Modules: Organic, Inorganic and Biological Chemistry, Physics, Mathematics and Statistics, Cytology and Anatomy, Zoology, Botany, Ecology, Molecular and Cellular Biology, Genetics, Animal and Plant Physiology, Microbiology and Immunology.
